Translation.name: Translation
Translation.description: The Translation object represents the languages enabled for translation in your Salesforce org.

CanManage.description: Indicates whether the language is available for translation (true) or not (false).Specify translators for each language through the Translation Language Setup page.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the translated values for this language display to users (true) or not (false).

Language.description: The language code. See the Salesforce Help for a full list of languages and their codes.
